tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Superhero
tags.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

tags.name: Surfing
tags.description: Centers around surfing as a sport.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Sweat
tags.description: Lots of sweat.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Table Tennis
tags.description: Centers around the sport of table tennis (also known as "ping pong").

tags.name: Tanks
tags.description: Prominently features the use of tanks or other armoured vehicles.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Teacher
tags.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

tags.name: Teens' Love
tags.description: Sexually explicit love-story between individuals of the opposite sex, specifically targeting females of teens and young adult age.

tags.name: Tennis
tags.description: Centers around the sport of tennis.

tags.name: Tentacles
tags.description: Features the long appendages most commonly associated with octopuses or squid, often sexually penetrating a character.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Threesome
tags.description: Features sexual acts between three people.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Trains
tags.description: Prominently features trains.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Triads
tags.description: Centered around Chinese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Vikings
tags.description: Prominently features Scandinavian seafaring pirates and warriors.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Virginity
tags.description: Features a male character who has never had sexual relations (until now).

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Volleyball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of volleyball.

tags.name: Vore
tags.description: Features a character being swallowed or swallowing another creature whole.

tags.name: Voyeur
tags.description: Features a character who enjoys seeing the sex acts or sex organs of others.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Watersports
tags.description: Features sexual situations involving urine.

tags.name: Werewolf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Wrestling
tags.description: Centers around the sport of wrestling.

tags.name: Writing
tags.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

tags.name: Wuxia
tags.description: Chinese fiction concerning the adventures of martial artists in Ancient China.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Zoophilia
tags.description: Features a character who has a sexual attraction for non-human animals.
